content.question: After spheres <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> are separated, what is the charge on sphere <math alttext="C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> ?
